lead_paragraph: Under-fire manager Alan Pardew said Crystal Palace are in a crisis following their six-game losing streak but refuted claims that he is a game away from being sacked.

headline.print_headline: Under-Fire Pardew Admits Palace Are in Crisis
headline.main: Under-Fire Pardew Admits Palace Are in Crisis

snippet: Under-fire manager Alan Pardew said Crystal Palace are in a crisis following their six-game losing streak but refuted claims that he is a game away from being sacked....
